ValidationRule.description: Only the Role Implementation Specialist can change Video to Waiting on Client Review and Waiting on Client Video Review
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordTypeId = "0124A000001UU1i", OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Waiting on Client Review"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Waiting on Client Video Review")), ISCHANGED(Status__c), $UserRole.Id <> '00EG0000000Fujk', $UserRole.Id <> '00E4A000001nUvd', $User.Id <> "005G0000005aVjt")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have the correct permissions to change status to Waiting on Client Review or Waiting on Client Video Review.
